pages.text: The $(mob)Yeti$() is a monster that spawns in Ice Plains in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight with powerful melee strikes that inflict $(thing)Slowness$() on hit. It is resistant to Fire, but vulnerable to warm climates, suffering a $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$() effect if it enters warm or hot biomes.
$(mob)Yetis$() drop $(item)Fur$() on death, which can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Leather$().
$(mob)Yetis$() rarely drop $()Freezing Book$() on death, which is a magical ranged weapon that launches snowballs which inflict $(thing)Slowness II$() on targets.
